paragraphs.title: Create Performers distribution by style
paragraphs.text:
import com.datastax.spark.connector._
import org.apache.spark.SparkContext._
import org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD

val PERFORMERS_TYPES = Map("Person"->"artist","Group"->"group")

val rdd:RDD[(String,List[String])] = sc.cassandraTable("spark_demo", "performers").
    select("type","styles").
    as((_:String,_:List[String])).
    map{case(performer_type,style) => (PERFORMERS_TYPES.getOrElse(performer_type,"Unknown"),style)}.
    filter{case(performer_type,_) => performer_type != "Unknown"}

val pairs:RDD[((String,String),Int)] = rdd.flatMap{
    case(performer_type,styles)=>styles.map(style => ((performer_type,style),1))
}

val reduced: RDD[((String, String), Int)] = pairs.reduceByKey{case(left,right) => left+right}

val flattened:RDD[(String,String,Int)] = reduced.map{
      case((performer_type,style),count) => (performer_type,style,count)
}

flattened.saveToCassandra("spark_demo", "performers_distribution_by_style", SomeColumns("type","style","count"))

groupDistributionByStyles = sc.cassandraTable("spark_demo", "performers_distribution_by_style").
    select("style","count").
    as((_:String,_:Int)).
    where("type='group'")

soloArtistsDistributionByStyles = sc.cassandraTable("spark_demo", "performers_distribution_by_style").
    select("style","count").
    as((_:String,_:Int)).
    where("type='artist'")

paragraphs.title: Display Style Distribution For Solo Artists
Top 10 styles Computation
paragraphs.text:
import com.datastax.spark.connector._
import com.datastax.spark.connector
import org.apache.spark.SparkContext
import org.apache.spark.SparkContext._
import org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra.CassandraSQLContext

val cc = new CassandraSQLContext(sc)

val groupRDD:RDD[(String,Int)] = cc.cassandraSql(s"""
    SELECT *
    FROM spark_demo.performers_distribution_by_style
    WHERE style != 'Unknown' AND type = 'group'
    """).
    map(row => (row.getString(1),row.getInt(2))).
    sortBy(tuple => tuple._2,false,1)

groupRDD.cache()

val soloArtistRDD:RDD[(String,Int)] = cc.cassandraSql(s"""
    SELECT *
    FROM spark_demo.performers_distribution_by_style
    WHERE style != 'Unknown' AND type = 'artist'
    """).
    map(row => (row.getString(1),row.getInt(2))).
    sortBy(tuple => tuple._2,false,1)

soloArtistRDD.cache()

// Count total number of artists having styles that are not in the top 10
val otherStylesCountForGroup:Int = groupRDD.
    collect().
    drop(10).
    map{case(_,count)=>count}.
    sum

// Count total number of groups having styles that are not in the top 10
val otherStylesCountForArtist:Int = soloArtistRDD.
    collect().
    drop(10).
    map{case(_,count)=>count}.
    sum

groups = sc.parallelize(groupRDD.take(10).toSeq :+ ("Others",otherStylesCountForGroup))
soloArtists = sc.parallelize(soloArtistRDD.take(10).toSeq :+ ("Others",otherStylesCountForArtist))
